en-US.summary: Get help winding down and getting ready for bed.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask sleep walker to get me ready for bed
Alexa tell sleep walker to help me get ready for bed
en-US.name: SleepWalker
en-US.description:
Ask for Sleep Walker, and start meeting your goals for getting enough sleep.

Sleep Walker will walk you through a series of simple actions that will get you ready for bed.

Wheter you use the built-in routine or create your own, a good night's sleep will help you feel rested and accomplish more the next day.

To start, just say "Alexa, open Sleep Walker" to get a menu of things to do, or say "Alexa, tell Sleep Walker to get me ready for bed" to go right to your bedtime routine.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
